My Work

Check out some of my projects

Travel Project Template Github

This is a simple website template for a travel agency. It utilizes technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript and SASS frameworks. It is fully responsive and can be easily implemented and optimized fore any travel agency.

Can not Choose App Github

This app allows you to input several options and chooses one them for you. It is created using Front End Technologies like React and Sass.

Expenser Github

This app helps you manage and organize your expenses. It uses google auth services to create an account for every user individualy, and stores its data on firebase.Furthermore is uses the Airbnb's Calendar Module in order to pick dates, and also utilizes front-end technologies such as React and Sass

Cook Book App Github

This is a recipe app that helps you find a recipe containing the ingredient you type. It uses the EDAMAM api to find recipes and utilizes front-end technologies such as React HTML CSS and Javascript.

Weatherfy Github

This is a weather prediction app that tells you the weather of a specific location that you type. It uses the Mapbox api to find coordinates of the location you typed and passes them to the Darksky api which in turn offers the weather prediction data. It utilizes front-end technologies such as React HTML CSS and Javascript.

Snake Game Github

This is an adaptation of the famous snake game. The logic was created mainly using Javascript and it was render using the react framework. Finaly the Sweetalert react modal was used as a replacement to the standard alert box.

Tasker Github

This is an application that tracks tasks assigned to different persons.It lets you udpate, mark as done and delete tasks, and it also displays the deleted tasks in a list. It is created using Front End Technologies like React and Sass.
